resources.string: This activity displays alphabetically all the artists from media library. Below every artist name you can see the sum of all albums and songs the artist has. When click on the arrow down it pops down a menu with all the albums of the artist. When click on the album it starts a new activity with all the songs from that album. When click on a particular song a new activity starts showing a media player interface with all that songs details.

This activity displays alphabetically all the albums from media library. Below album\'s name is attached artist name and in the left side the album cover miniaturized. When click on the album it starts a new activity with all the songs from that album. When click on a particular song a new activity starts showing a media player interface with all that songs details.

This activity displays alphabetically all the songs from media library. Every row displays song name, duration, artist name and album name. When click on a particular song a new activity starts showing a media player interface with all that songs details.
This activity is for customized playlists.

This activity displays alphabetically all the songs of this album from media library. Every row displays song name, duration, artist name and album name. When click on a particular song a new activity starts showing a media player interface with all that songs details.

This activity is a media player interface for songs. It has two bars : one at the top and one at the bottom. The top bar displays details of the song: artist name, song name and album name. In the top left corner there is a button for dolby surround and in the right corner a button for repeat. The bottom bar contains buttons for rewind, play, fast froward and stop.
The sources of this media library are from values resources (arrays.xml) and icons and covers from drawable resources.
